mapper.select: select count(url) as count, url, title, `desc`, img from bookmark where `is_public` = 1 and `is_deleted` = 0 group by url, title, `desc`, img order by count desc limit #{from}, #{size};
select count(distinct url) from bookmark where `is_public` = 1 and `is_deleted` = 0

select id, user_name, title, url, img, `desc`, creation_time, is_public from bookmark
`is_deleted` = 0 and (
`user_name` = #{specUsername} or
`is_public` = 1 )
order by `id` desc
limit #{from},#{size}
select id, user_name, title, url, img, `desc`, creation_time, is_public from bookmark where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_deleted = 0;
select id, user_name, title, url, img, `desc`, creation_time, is_public from bookmark where url = #{url} and is_deleted = 0;
select url, title, img, `desc` from bookmark where `is_public` = 1 and is_deleted = 0 group by url, title, `desc`, img;
mapper.insert: insert into bookmark(user_name, title, url, img, `desc`, `creation_time`, `is_public`) values (#{userName}, #{title}, #{url}, #{img}, #{desc}, #{createTime}, #{isPublic})
mapper.update: update bookmark set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `creation_time` = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `is_public` = #{isPublic,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select b.user_name, b.title, b.url, b.is_public, v.bookmark_id, v.views from bookmark_view v left join bookmark b on v.bookmark_id = b.id where is_deleted = 0 order by v.views desc limit #{from},#{size};
